original_text: Now it came to pass when Sanballat, and Tobiah, and Geshem the Arabian, and the rest of our enemies, heard that I had builded the wall, and that there was no breach left therein; (though at that time I had not set up the doors upon the gates;)
korean_text: 산발랏과 도비야와 아라비아 사람 게셈과 그 나머지 우리의 원수들이 내가 성벽을 건축하여 허물어진 틈을 남기지 아니하였다 함을 들었는데 그 때는 내가 아직 성문에 문짝을 달지 못한 때였더라

sentences.original_text: when Sanballat, and Tobiah, and Geshem the Arabian,
and the rest of our enemies,
heard that I had builded the wall,
and that there was no breach left therein;
sentences.korean_translation: 그 안에 틈이 남지 않았다는 것을 들었으니

sentences.original_text: I had not set up doors upon the gates;
